page.shortlink: api client api a5 u json compress method

argument.name: object
argument.description: The object or array to compress.

argument.name: map
argument.description: The object that will be dynamically filled in with the property name map.

return.name: compressedObject
return.description: The compressed version of the passed in object.

page.description: Compress an object for storage purposes.

discussion.p: This method will take an arbitrary object and convert all property names to a short name (such as "a"). The passed in map object will be populated with the long names to match the short names generated, to be used by *[link:A5.u.json.expand]* to return the original uncompressed object. This is useful for compressing large, repetitive data.
